data.name: Brotate
data.detailed_description:
Introducing Brotate

A casual platforming game where the controls are a little different. Rotate the screen to move your character to the exit.
Navigate your way around the obstacles to find a safe path to the end.

Avoid Traps

Avoid the fire placed around the edges of the map

Keys

Some doors need keys to open to progress. Find these around the map to move to other areas

Portals

The exit isnt the only portal. Some portals can take you to new areas, but not always take you back.

Bonus Levels

Collect coins along the way. You may have enough to unlock bonus levels from the main screen.

Save Progress

Once a level is completed, the progress is saved so you never forget your place.

data.short_description: A casual platformer with a twist. Navigate your way through the obstacles to reach the end.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
